title.rendered: “IDF Releases Names of Fallen Soldiers: Details, Updates, and Injuries from Recent Gaza Strip Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson on the subject of the identities of three IDF casualties whose names have been given to their families:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC3101202473989102

Attached is a link to the IDF website, which publishes and updates the details and photos of the fallen:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In the battle in which Capt. (Res.) Gabriel Shani and Major (Res.) Yuval Nir fell, two reserve soldiers from Patrol Battalion 6646, Northern Fox Formation (646), were seriously wounded.

Also, a soldier in the Paratroopers Brigade was seriously injured in a battle in the center of the Gaza Strip.

Additionally, a soldier and tank commander from Shaked Battalion, Givati Brigade, were seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.

The wounded soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital, their families have been updated.
